Name: Wolf Gang
About the game: Wolf Gang is a tactical turn based game where you play as a band of wolves as they make their way around the mountain, pursuing their territorial aspirations while fighting other animals. The combat revolves around a unique rule set that puts the tides of advantage constantly in flux. Knock outs are only temporary, and the traditional rock-paper-scissors strength and weakness hierarchy is subverted with a system of constantly rotating attunements. Features Accessible pick-up-and-play puzzle game-play Story driven single player campaign Additional challenges for completionists Tons of unlockables and character customization
